body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, attorney. Virginia native. Married Elizabeth C. Flournoy. Father of Richard C. A. Flournoy. Attorney in Paducah in 1850. Partner in the Iowa Land Company with Jeremiah T. Boyle. Partner in the Ohio and New Orleans Railroad with James Campbell, John Crockett, S. F. Singleton, William Norton, Henry Enders, James Langstaff, and B. F. Givens in Paducah in 1853. President of the Paducah Commerce Bank in Paducah in 1860.
